Summary: A fleet of white sliver stars in alot of different formations.
divs: Sighting Detailsas we see on the web.....a was amazed ....i didn't believe what on the web ...until i saw it with my own eye traviling in 3 separate formations, but all the formations where traviling with the same speed ...no shifting like happens with bird formations ...it was very high traviling from west south to nort east direction .... i was walking to work ...by the time i got my phone out to get a shot they started disappearing and it took like 3-4 seconds to completely disappear... they disappeared in formations, every formation dissapeared as agroup , they all disappeared from left to right....the thing is that the formations had no bended lines ...there was strait lines and some acute and right angles.... this angels did not shift or change during my watching time
trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There were 3 other sightings in New York on or around December 17th 2009
